summary: An ordinance authorizing the employment of certain architects to prepare plans and specifications for, and supervise construction of a proposed City Hall and public office building in Block 31, Plat of an Addition to the Town of Seattle, laid out on the claims of C. D. Boren, A. A. Denny and H. L. Yesler; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
